name: A-go Flip
description: The A-go Flip, conceived by Matt Poli of The Publican in Chicago, is a deep and complex riff on classic eggnog. With rum and rich PX sherry as a base, it has the creamy feel we all know and love, with flavors that will make even non-noggers take notice.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 ounce aged rum, such as Atlantico Reserva

recipeInstructions.text: Crack egg into cocktail shaker. Add sherry, rum, bitters, and demerara syrup. Dry shake to emulsify egg, about 15 seconds.
Add ice to cocktail shaker and shake until well chilled, about 15 seconds. Strain into cocktail glass. Grate cinnamon stick on top of drink and serve.
